香港警察夠膽死用催淚彈
屌

credit to Edward Wong
https://www.facebook.com/EdInDisguise/posts/2354261268020477

//室內使用胡椒噴霧或類似刺激性氣/液體，構成「殘忍、不人道或侮辱之處遇」，100% abso-fucking-lutely 為人權法所不容
'... [P]epper spray is a potentially dangerous substance and should not be used in confined spaces. Even when used in open spaces the CPT has serious reservations; if exceptionally it needs to be used, there should be clearly defined safeguards in place. For example, persons exposed to pepper spray should be granted immediate access to a medical doctor and be offered an antidote. ...'
- Ali Gunes v Turkey (2013) 57 EHRR 20 at paras 39, 41

'... [P]epper spray is a potentially dangerous substance and should not be used in confined spaces; if exceptionally it needs to be used in open spaces, there should be clearly defined safeguards in place. ... Having regard to these potentially serious effects of the use of pepper spray in a confined space on the one hand and the alternative equipment at the disposal of the prison guards, such as flak jackets, helmets and shields on the other, the Court finds that the circumstances did not justify the use of pepper spray.'
- Tali v Estonia, App No 66393/10 (ECtHR, 1st Section, 13 February 2014) at para 78 //
